marketplaces.name: pcircle-ai
marketplaces.description: Official PCIRCLE AI marketplace for Claude Code plugins - productivity tools, AI enhancements, and developer utilities
marketplaces.repo_description: MeMesh - Your AI memory mesh for Claude Code. Smart routing, persistent memory, and intelligent task management. (Formerly Claude Code Buddy)

files.README.md:
# üß† MeMesh ### **Persistent Memory for Claude Code** **Give Claude long-term memory. Remember decisions, context, and code. Build faster.** [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@pcircle/memesh)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@pcircle/memesh) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-AGPL--3.0-blue.svg)](LICENSE) [![MCP](https://img.shields.io/badge/MCP-1.25.3-purple.svg)](https://modelcontextprotocol.io) [üöÄ Quick Install](#-quick-install) ‚Ä¢ [üí¨ Commands](#-3-commands-to-rule-them-all) ‚Ä¢ [üìñ Docs](docs/) ‚Ä¢ [ÁπÅÈ´î‰∏≠Êñá](README.zh-TW.md)
--- ## ü§î The Problem Every new Claude Code session: ``` You: "Remember our auth setup?" Claude: "I don't have that context..." You: *explains for the 47th time* üò§ ``` **Claude has amnesia. Your productivity dies.** --- ## ‚ú® The Solution ```bash # Session 1 (Monday) You: buddy-do "setup JWT auth" MeMesh: ‚úÖ Done + saved to memory # Session 50 (Friday) You: buddy-remember "auth" MeMesh: üìö JWT auth from Jan 15 ‚Üí Access tokens: 15min ‚Üí Refresh tokens: 7 days ``` **MeMesh = Claude with working memory.** --- ## üöÄ Quick Install ```bash npm install -g @pcircle/memesh ``` Restart Claude Code. **Done.**
üì¶ Alternative: Install from source ```bash git clone https://github.com/PCIRCLE-AI/claude-code-buddy.git cd claude-code-buddy npm install && npm run build npm link # or use ./scripts/quick-install.sh ```
--- ## üí¨ 3 Commands to Rule Them All ```bash buddy-do "any dev task" # Execute + remember buddy-remember "topic" # Instant recall buddy-help # When stuck ``` **Examples:** ```bash buddy-do "explain this codebase" buddy-do "add user authentication" buddy-do "fix the build error" buddy-remember "API design decisions" buddy-remember "why we chose PostgreSQL" buddy-help # Shows all available commands ``` --- ## üéØ Core Features ### üß† **Persistent Memory** - Remembers project decisions (90 days) - Recalls session context (30 days) - Semantic search across all memories ### üîç **Knowledge Graph** - Automatically organizes your knowledge - Links related concepts - FTS5 + vector search ### ‚ö° **Zero Config** - Auto-tracks project changes - Auto-tags memories - Just install and use --- ## üìö Learn More **Core Documentation**: - **[User Guide](docs/USER_GUIDE.md)** - Complete usage guide - **[Commands Reference](docs/COMMANDS.md)** - All available commands and tools - **[Getting Started](docs/GETTING_STARTED.md)** - Installation guide - **[Troubleshooting](docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md)** - Common issues **Advanced Documentation**: - **[Architecture](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md)** - System architecture and design - **[Best Practices](docs/BEST_PRACTICES.md)** - Usage tips and recommendations - **[API Reference](docs/api/API_REFERENCE.md)** - Complete API documentation --- ## ü§ù Contributing We welcome contributions! See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines. --- ## üìÑ License AGPL-3.0 - See [LICENSE](LICENSE) ---
**Built by vibe coders, for vibe coders** üöÄ [Report Bug](https://github.com/PCIRCLE-AI/claude-code-buddy/issues) ‚Ä¢ [Request Feature](https://github.com/PCIRCLE-AI/claude-code-buddy/discussions)
